goals.description: I'm seeking for a remote job offer in Information Technology area, specifically as a Software Development and/or a Software Architect. I'm looking for a professional environment where there is: Flexible schedule; interest in acquiring new knowledge; harmony between professional and personal life; committed teams and a company that provides me with necessary conditions to perform my craft with mastery.

experiences.companyDescription: A pioneer company on building software solutions to the Brazilian Government Tax System. Specialized in issuing, receiving, storing and sharing fiscal documents like NF-e, NFC-e, MDF-e, CT-e, CT-e OS, CF-e and MF-e.
experiences.roles: Software Developer, Software Architect, Tech Leader
experiences.mainActivities: General maintenance (bugs, improvements, new features, refactoring etc); Tech Leading; Software Architecture; Tech Support Levels 2 and 3; Software documentation; Reverse Engineering (to document based on source-code); software building; Quality Assurance; teaching and training, my staff and other staffs; hiring and firing; internal events organization; continuous integration.
Tech Support Level 1 and 2; installation; customer and new employees training; user documentation.

experiences.companyDescription: The Software Tech Center (In Portuguese, Centro Tecnológico de Software) was a research group created to 1) provide students experience in software ratification and software testing. 2) allow Brazilian companies which develop PAF-ECF applications (Tax Application Program – Tax Coupon Issuer) to have their products approved and homologated by the Brazilian Internal Revenue Service.
experiences.mainActivities: Contact with client, scheduling; analysis and improvement of the tests route; software testing; homologation follow-up; writing an approval report.
